definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the reaction he received from passers-by was one of complete  bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的是，当时与他擦身而过的人是多么的困惑。

sentences.english: As I expected , he did not believe me.
sentences.chinese: 果不出我所料，他不相信我。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the reaction he received from passers-by was one of complete bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的是，当时与他擦身而过的人是多么的困惑。

sentences.english: As Harry had expected, Hermione raised her hand.
sentences.chinese: 不出哈利所料，赫敏举起了她的手。

sentences.english: True to my prediction, in the afternoon I ran to the park. There was nothing left but the tender twigs.
sentences.chinese: 果不出所料，下午再跑到公园，只剩嫩枝了。

sentences.english: They came downstairs as I expected.
sentences.chinese: 正如我所料，他们下楼来了。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the answer turns out to be no.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的答案是，不存在这样的线性函数。

sentences.english: Just as Mr Bowen has expected, Mr Ho says his offer is negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 不出伯恩先生所料，胡先生说他的报价可以谈判。

sentences.english: As you would expect, there are various trade-offs associated with each topology.
sentences.chinese: 如您所料，每种拓扑结构都存在不同的权衡。

sentences.english: Other scattered races in the region yielded few surprises.
sentences.chinese: 在这个地区零星竞选结果大致未出所料。

sentences.english: We hope things will pan out as we expect.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望事情的结果如我们所料。

sentences.english: The machine, as might be expected, has stopped operating.
sentences.chinese: 正如所料，这台机器已停止运转。

sentences.english: That's what I've thought, only about half of the class.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料，只有大概一半的学生看过。

sentences.english: So, as predicted, Pete went the journey.
sentences.chinese: 因此，不出所料，皮特去旅行了。

sentences.english: This was, as expected, a game with some strong challenges and lots of set-pieces.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料，这是一场对抗强悍和定位球频现的比赛。

sentences.english: We are having a sunny day today.
sentences.chinese: 如我所料，今天是个大晴天。

definition: to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
due to/to stem from/to go beyond (also fig. beyond reason, expectations etc)/to go against (expectations)
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
hidden smile/smirk/to rejoice covertly/secret satisfaction concerning one's evil plans
to come as no surprise/as expected
